title: China drugmaker pulls flu treatment tainted with toxic herbs
author: Eric Palmer
description: China revamped, renamed and promoted its drug regulator recently after a series of embarrassing disclosures last year by Chinese media about toxic capsules and cooking oil used in antibiotics. But no sooner had the new ministerial-level agency made its debut then state TV in China reported a new scandal that affected one of its larger drugmakers. | Disclosure comes just weeks after regulatory revamp of drug agency there
